phrases.error.packages.userpanel_oauth.error.app: This user has 'apps' or 'apps'; If the user is removed, all programs and access to this program will be removed! And it may cause secondary problems!
phrases.packages.userpanel_oauth.error.apps.dele: You can view the 'apps' of this user using the following link.
If you want to view this user's 'apps', ask the person who has this access.
phrases.error.packages.userpanel_oauth.error.acc: This user has 'access' or 'accesses'; If the user is deleted, all accesses of this user will be deleted! And it may cause secondary problems!
